DOC.brief_summary: A study investigate pharmacodynamic pharmacokinetic interaction furosemide ipragliflozin ( ASP1941 ) healthy volunteer .
DOC.brief_title: Drug Drug Interaction Study With Ipragliflozin Furosemide
DOC.criteria: Body Mass Index ( BMI ) equal 18.5 less 30.0 kg/m2 Any liver function test upper limit normal Abnormal pulse and/or blood pressure measurement prestudy visit follow : Pulse < 40 > 90 bpm ; mean systolic blood pressure > 140 mmHg ; mean diastolic blood pressure > 90 mmHg ( blood pressure measurement take triplicate subject rest supine position 5 min ; pulse measure automatically ) A QTc interval > 430 m ( male ) > 450 m ( female ) consistently duplicate measurement , history unexplained syncope , cardiac arrest , unexplained cardiac arrhythmia torsades de pointes , structural heart disease , family history Long QT Syndrome ( LQTS )
